posts.title: Birth of a dream
posts.content: Born and bred in Kitwe's Kapoto compound,having witnessed first hand the low standards of living in the community he grew up in in his formative years, Noah Aaron Mwewa gave birth to an idea of a platform that would contribute towards poverty alleviation in Zambia. What is now Posterity Zambia started off close to a decade ago  as Love Just Foundation, a community based organization aimed at raising and sharing resources amongst the most vulnerable in society.
